21: יְדַבְּרוּ־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>shall speak</n> ל֞וֹ אֵלֵ֧י <sup>410 </sup> <n>The strong</n> גִבּוֹרִ֛ים <sup>1368 </sup> <n>among the mighty</n> מִתּ֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>to him out of the midst</n> שְׁא֖וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>of hell</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>that</n> עֹֽזְרָ֑יו <sup>5826 </sup> <n>with them that help</n> יָֽרְד֛וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>him they are gone down</n> שָׁכְב֥וּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>they lie</n> הָעֲרֵלִ֖ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>uncircumcised</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>slain</n> חָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n>
22: שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>is there</n> אַשּׁוּר֙ <sup>804 </sup> <n>Asshur</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> קְהָלָ֔הּ <sup>6951 </sup> <n>[is] there and all her company</n> סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <sup>5439 </sup> <n>[are] about</n> קִבְרֹתָ֑יו <sup>6913 </sup> <n>his graves</n> כֻּלָּ֣ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her All</n> חֲלָלִ֔ים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>him all of them slain</n> הַנֹּפְלִ֖ים <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fallen</n> בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n>

24: שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>is there</n> עֵילָם֙ <sup>5867 </sup> <n>There [is] Elam</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>and all her multitude</n> סְבִיב֖וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <sup>6900 </sup> <n>her grave</n> כֻּלָּ֣ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֲלָלִים֩ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>all of them slain</n> הַנֹּפְלִ֨ים <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fallen</n> בַּחֶ֜רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָרְד֥וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>which are gone down</n> עֲרֵלִ֣ים ׀ <sup>6189 </sup> <n>uncircumcised</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>of</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> תַּחְתִּיּ֗וֹת <sup>8482 </sup> <n>into the nether parts</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נָתְנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which caused</n> חִתִּיתָם֙ <sup>2851 </sup> <n>their terror</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַיִּ֔ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n> וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>yet have they borne</n> כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <sup>3639 </sup> <n>their shame</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֥וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that go down</n> בֽוֹר׃ <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n>
25: בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> חֲ֠לָלִים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>of the slain</n> נָתְנ֨וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>They have set</n> מִשְׁכָּ֥ב <sup>4904 </sup> <n>her a bed</n> לָהּ֙ בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>with all her multitude</n> סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <sup>5439 </sup> <n>[are] round about</n> קִבְרֹתֶ֑הָ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>her graves</n> כֻּלָּ֣ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>are all</n> עֲרֵלִ֣ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>him all of them uncircumcised</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>slain</n> חֶ֡רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> נִתַּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>was caused</n> חִתִּיתָ֜ם <sup>2851 </sup> <n>though their terror</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַיִּ֗ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n> וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>yet have they borne</n> כְלִמָּתָם֙ <sup>3639 </sup> <n>their shame</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֣וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that go down</n> ב֔וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> חֲלָלִ֖ים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>of [them that be] slain</n> נִתָּֽן׃ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he is put</n>
26: שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>are there</n> מֶ֤שֶׁךְ <sup>4902 </sup> <n>There [is] Meshech</n> תֻּבַל֙ <sup>8422 </sup> <n>Tubal</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>and all her multitude</n> סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <sup>5439 </sup> <n>[are] round about</n> קִבְרוֹתֶ֑יהָ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>her graves</n> כֻּלָּ֤ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> עֲרֵלִים֙ <sup>6189 </sup> <n>him all of them uncircumcised</n> מְחֻ֣לְלֵי <sup>2490 </sup> <n>slain</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> נָתְנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>though they caused</n> חִתִּיתָ֖ם <sup>2851 </sup> <n>their terror</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַיִּֽים׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n>
27: וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>And they shall not lie</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>beside</n> גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <sup>1368 </sup> <n>with the mighty</n> נֹפְלִ֖ים <sup>5307 </sup> <n>[that are] fallen</n> מֵעֲרֵלִ֑ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>of the uncircumcised</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָרְדֽוּ־ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>which are gone down</n> שְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>to hell</n> בִּכְלֵֽי־ <sup>3627 </sup> <n>with their weapons</n> מִלְחַמְתָּם֩ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and they have laid</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חַרְבוֹתָ֜ם <sup>2719 </sup> <n>their swords</n> תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> רָאשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <sup>7218 </sup> <n>under their heads</n> וַתְּהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>rested</n> עֲוֹֽנֹתָם֙ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>but their iniquities</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עַצְמוֹתָ֔ם <sup>6106 </sup> <n>shall be upon their bones</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> חִתִּ֥ית <sup>2851 </sup> <n>though [they were] the terror</n> גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <sup>1368 </sup> <n>of the mighty</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַיִּֽים׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n>
28: וְאַתָּ֗ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּת֧וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> עֲרֵלִ֛ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>of the uncircumcised</n> תִּשָּׁבַ֥ר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>Yea thou shalt be broken</n> וְתִשְׁכַּ֖ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and shalt lie</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with [them that are] slain</n> חָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n>
29: שָׁ֣מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> אֱד֗וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>There [is] Edom</n> מְלָכֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>her kings</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> נְשִׂיאֶ֔יהָ <sup>5387 </sup> <n>and all her princes</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נִתְּנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>are laid</n> בִגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <sup>1369 </sup> <n>which with their might</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>by [them that were] slain</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> הֵ֛מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> עֲרֵלִ֥ים <sup>6189 </sup> <n>with the uncircumcised</n> יִשְׁכָּ֖בוּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>they shall lie</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> יֹ֥רְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and with them that go down</n> בֽוֹר׃ <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n>
30: שָׁ֣מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> נְסִיכֵ֥י <sup>5257 </sup> <n>There [be] the princes</n> צָפ֛וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> כֻּלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> צִֽדֹנִ֑י <sup>6722 </sup> <n>all of them and all the Zidonians</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָרְד֣וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>which are gone down</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> חֲלָלִ֗ים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with the slain</n> בְּחִתִּיתָ֤ם <sup>2851 </sup> <n>with their terror</n> מִגְבֽוּרָתָם֙ <sup>1369 </sup> <n>of their might</n> בּוֹשִׁ֔ים <sup>954 </sup> <n>they are ashamed</n> וַיִּשְׁכְּב֤וּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and they lie</n> עֲרֵלִים֙ <sup>6189 </sup> <n>uncircumcised</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>with [them that be] slain</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and bear</n> כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <sup>3639 </sup> <n>their shame</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֥וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that go down</n> בֽוֹר׃ <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n>
31: אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> יִרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> פַרְעֹ֔ה <sup>6547 </sup> <n>Pharaoh</n> וְנִחַ֖ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>them and shall be comforted</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> [הֲמֹונֹה כ] (הֲמֹונֹ֑ו <sup>1995 </sup> <n>abundance</n> ק) חַלְלֵי־ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>slain</n> חֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> פַּרְעֹ֣ה <sup>6547 </sup> <n>[even] Pharaoh</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> חֵיל֔וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>and all his army</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n>
